analysis.description:
Contract locking ether found in /unique_chucks/12/0xe1521029d2591ba2a0f92b6e744a825f665f748b.sol:
	Contract IndexEmpireToken has payable functions:
	 - fallback (/unique_chucks/12/0xe1521029d2591ba2a0f92b6e744a825f665f748b.sol#204-205)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether

Detected issues with version pragma in /unique_chucks/12/0xe1521029d2591ba2a0f92b6e744a825f665f748b.sol:
	- pragma solidity^0.4.18 (/unique_chucks/12/0xe1521029d2591ba2a0f92b6e744a825f665f748b.sol#1): it allows old versions
Parameter '_newOwner' of Owned.transferOwnership (/unique_chucks/12/0xe1521029d2591ba2a0f92b6e744a825f665f748b.sol#73-74) is not in mixedCase
